content: अवष्टंभमय {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (यी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) Golden, made of gold, or as large as a post; रघोरवष्टंभमयेन पत्रिणा <ls>R. 3. 53</ls> (अ° is usually rendered in the above manner, but from the immediate context, it should more properly mean ‘full of dignified boldness’, ‘breathing defiance’).
